entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
